name: Flashed Tool Bag Chalk Bucket
description: Big bucket with lots of room for chalk and hands. You can add weight to the bottom and stabilize it on uneven terrain.Made of Hypalon® and polyester, lined with fleece.Hypalon closure flaps have die-cut brush openings and roll up to buckle into a handle grip feature.The bottom opens to add extra weight so you can anchor the bag on slopes and uneven ground.Available in a variety of colours, and you won't be able to choose. Life is so uncertain.
